attributes.action: Put the uni payment back to normal it is unfair on students
attributes.additional_details: Because it is unfair on people of lower class to all the rich kids
attributes.background: So , students who go to uni will have to pay more money but that is so unfair so we would love for that to be abolished and make it less money for more people to get a better education and better jobs

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may be interested to know that the Government has confirmed that it will freeze tuition fees for a standard full-time course in the 2023/24 and 2024/25 academic year in England at a maximum of £9,250.
